bilingual.source: The city levies a fee for garbage collection.
bilingual.target: 该城市对垃圾收集征收费用。

bilingual.source: They used various methods for data collection.
bilingual.target: 他们使用了多种方法来收集数据。

bilingual.source: Data collection is a crucial part of this project.
bilingual.target: 收集数据是这个项目的关键部分。

bilingual.source: Please leave your trash at the curbside for collection.
bilingual.target: 请把你的垃圾放在路边等待收集。

bilingual.source: Many network tools use snmp for data collection.
bilingual.target: 许多网络工具使用简单网络管理协议进行数据收集。

bilingual.source: The collection process of primary data can be very time-consuming.
bilingual.target: 原始数据的收集过程可能非常耗时。

bilingual.source: The efficiency of crawlers affects the speed of data collection.
bilingual.target: 爬虫程序的效率影响数据收集的速度。

bilingual.source: omr technology has improved the efficiency of data collection.
bilingual.target: 光学标记识别技术提高了数据收集的效率。

bilingual.source: The presence of outliers can indicate errors in data collection.
bilingual.target: 异常值的存在可能表明数据收集中的错误。

bilingual.source: Statistics is the study of data collection, analysis, and interpretation.
bilingual.target: 统计学是研究数据收集、分析和解释的学科。

list.abstract: COLLECTION（英[kəˈlekʃn]，美[kəˈlekʃn]），是英文单词，作名词为聚集；积聚；集中。短语搭配有waste collection（废物收集）。例句为“Most people purchase them for collection.（大多数人购买它们是为了收藏。）” 该单词复数形式为collections，名词类近义词为clustering、gather。

COLLECTION：选集，又称合集。大部分收录的是所谓的“精华”。
　　ィメ－ジ·アルバム / IMAGE ALBUM印象集：不同于OST，其中的曲子并非是对原剧中的音乐忠实的再现，而是通过与原作有些不同的方式将原曲演奏出来，以便相对独立的构成曲目（更适合像音乐会演奏的场合）。给人的感觉是印象中的原曲。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, what is in here? Rocks? No-no, this is my collection of fossil samples. So, rocks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 里面是什么？石头吗？不，我收集的化石样本。就是石头嘛。

yingyinNormal.en: Let's make a collection of all the things we find. Yes, we'll put them in George's bucket.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们把各自找到的东西都收集起来吧。好的，就放在乔治的水桶里面吧。

yingyinNormal.en: A nice, shiny dime to add to your collection.
yingyinNormal.zh: 给你的收藏中添一枚亮闪闪的硬币。

yingyinNormal.en: And my precious souvenir snow globe collection.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有我全球的雪景水晶球。

yingyinNormal.en: I was trying to make arrowheads for my rock collection.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想做一个箭头来作石头收藏品。

yingyinNormal.en: That is so sweet! But I prefer the gold collection, but thank you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真好，但我更想要金饰，还是要谢谢你。

yingyinNormal.en: I was chasing a rare Achemon Sphinx Moth for my collection. I have one.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当时为了我的标本收藏在追一只稀有的葡萄蔓天蛾。我有一只哦。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, well, then we'll probably need to talk about your stuffed bear collection.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么我还想谈谈你的毛毛熊收藏。

yingyinNormal.en: Ooh, tell her cute dress, Nanette Lepore, fall collection. Great. I'll open with cute dress.
yingyinNormal.zh: 告诉她裙子很可爱，公主娜娜的秋装好极了。我就用"可爱的裙子"开场。

yingyinNormal.en: Why Larry? did Larry call dibs? Will you forget dibs? He offered me a fair price for the whole collection.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么是拉里？拉里有权要求了？你能不能别提有权要求了？就这整套东西他提了个合理的价钱。

yingyinNormal.en: A story that's not just a collection of titles and positions, but a story that is really about your purpose.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不仅要陈述心中的头衔与职位，也要说出做出这些目标的因由。

yingyinNormal.en: You got a little boy. He shows you his butterfly collection, plus the killing jar. I'd take him to the doctor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的孩子展示了他的蝴蝶标本，还有他杀蝴蝶时的场景。我带他去看医生。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, you and your ways. Since it's Christmas time. I'm going to be one of those people collection donations. Oh.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的笑话真冷，圣诞节快到了，我要负责去募捐。

yingyinNormal.en: And you're also blithely unaware of the fact that in 2002, Oscar de la Renta did a collection of cerulean gowns.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还轻率地忽视很多事情，像奥斯卡·德拉伦塔在2002年，设计过一系列天蓝色的晚礼服。

yingyinNormal.en: No, I mean gravity. History class is not about poetry. Names and dates. History is a collection of names and dates.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我说的就是重力。历史课不是讲诗歌的。是讲名字和日期的。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I call dibs on the golden age flash. Hang on. I need that to complete my justice society of America collection.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有权要求那"Golden Age Flash"(一部漫画)。等等，我要靠它来集全"正义联盟"(一部漫画)。

yingyinNormal.en: But be warned, this collection of priceless artworks and antiquities is simply too vast to explore in just one day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但请注意，这里收藏太多珍贵的艺术品和骨董馆藏，不可能在短短一天就全部看完。

yingyinNormal.en: Not far from the Musee du Louvre stands the Centre Pompidou, displaying the largest collection of modern art in Europe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 距离卢浮宫不远的庞毕度中心，展示全欧洲馆藏数量最多的现代艺术作品。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I called dibs at the Christmas party when Professor Rothman tried to have intercourse with the Toys for Tots collection box.
yingyinNormal.zh: 早在圣诞节派对上罗斯曼教授试图跟玩具盒里的公仔做爱时，我就说了这里归我了。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't know. If we're going to start a fantasy sword collection and I've long thought we should is this really the sword to start with?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不知道。如果我们要开始收藏奇幻剧中的刀剑，虽然我很久前就认为应该收藏，但真的要从这把开始吗？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Derek Jarman's yellow-tinted film Towards Avebury, a <highlight>collection</highlight> of long, mostly still shots of the Wiltshire landscape, evokes a tradition.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 德里克·贾曼的泛黄电影《朝向埃夫伯里》是有关威尔特郡风景的一组远景且大都是静态的影像集合，该影片唤起了一种传统。

examination_example.sentence: He appears as a character, or a <highlight>collection</highlight> of American personalities, in the 1945 movie The Story of G.I. Joe.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在1945年的电影《美国大兵乔的故事》中，他作为一个角色出现，一个集中了美国人性格特点的角色。

examination_example.sentence: The second half of the 20th century saw a <highlight>collection</highlight> of geniuses, warriors, entrepreneurs and visionaries labour.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 20世纪下半叶聚集了一群天才、战士、企业家和有远见卓识的劳动者。

sense_info_list.en: an assembly of items such as works of art, pieces of writing, or natural objects, especially one systematically ordered

examination_example.sentence: What was more, many original French dispatches had been preserved in this <highlight>collection</highlight>, which I realized was priceless.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 更重要的是，许多原始的法国公文被保存在这个收藏中，我意识到这是无价之宝。

examination_example.sentence: Classifying their plastic <highlight>collections</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对他们的塑料收藏品进行分类。

sense_info_list.en: the action or process of collecting someone or something

examination_example.sentence: I need to concede that my <highlight>collection</highlight> of "Smiling Victorians" makes up only a tiny percentage of the vast catalogue of photographic portraiture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我必须承认我收集的“微笑的维多利亚人”只占大量肖像照片中的极小一部分。

sense_info_list.en: a range of new clothes or items for the home that are designed

examination_example.sentence: Fast-fashion companies have made efforts to curb their impact on labor and the environment — including H&M, with its green Conscious <highlight>Collection</highlight> line.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 快时尚公司们已经努力控制它们对劳动力和环境的影响，包括H&M，它推出了环保自觉行动系列时装线。

sense_info_list.en: an instance of collecting money in a church service or for a charitable cause
a group of poems, stories or pieces of music published together as one book or disc

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: an assembly of items such as works of art, pieces of writing, or natural objects, especially one systematically ordered

examination_example.sentence: What becomes set in the firm's culture is a contagious <highlight>collection</highlight> of affirmative and positive emotions which are usually shared among the team.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一系列有感染力、乐观积极且往往为团队成员所共有的情绪渐渐在公司文化中固定下来。

examination_example.sentence: A <highlight>collection</highlight> of dramatic videos and photos quickly spread across social media, and attracting emotional responses from people all over the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一组戏剧性的视频和照片迅速在社交媒体上传播开来，引起了世界各地人们的情感反应。

examination_example.sentence: Just 18 percent of 2,413 books in the total <highlight>collection</highlight> contained any representation of non-white people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在2413本书中，只有18%的书包含了非白人的代表。

sense_info_list.en: a group of objects, often of the same sort, that have been collected
sense_info_list.zh: (~s)(常指同类的)收藏品; 展览品

examination_example.sentence: It won over Coke executives in Atlanta and would go on to receive its trademark, spur <highlight>collections</highlight> and earn Coca-Cola an iconic image.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它赢得了可口可乐在亚特兰大的高管的支持，并将继续获得自己的商标，刺激了系列产品，并为可口可乐赢得了一个标志性的形象。

examination_example.sentence: Even though we asked the management, they refused to give us detailed answers as to why they would do this with their <highlight>collection</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管我们问了管理部门，但他们拒绝向我们详细解答他们为什么要这样对待他们的收藏品。

examination_example.sentence: Grand Tourists often saw paintings and sculptures by gaining admission to private <highlight>collections</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “大游客”(Grand Tourist)经常得通过获得私人收藏家的许可才能欣赏到绘画和雕塑作品。

sense_info_list.en: the action or process of collecting someone or something

examination_example.sentence: There is no reason why visitors to the UK should be exempt from taxation—particularly when vital local services including waste <highlight>collection</highlight> are under unprecedented strain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 去英国旅游的游客没有理由免税，尤其是在包括垃圾收集在内的重要地方服务面临前所未有压力的情况下。

examination_example.sentence: Many more out-of-control bits that would pose even more hazards to the growing <highlight>collection</highlight> of satellites in space.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 更多失控的碎片将对不断增长的太空卫星收集构成更大的危害。

sense_info_list.en: a range of new clothes produced by one clothes designer
a group of poems, stories or pieces of music published together as one book or disc

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the action or process of collecting someone or something

examination_example.sentence: We have lots of ideas about what to do to add to your <highlight>collection</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于如何添加到您的收藏中，我们有很多想法。

examination_example.sentence: Al last,  their <highlight>collection</highlight> bags were so heavy that they had to hold them with both arms．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后，他们的收集袋太重了，他们不得不用双臂抱着。

sense_info_list.en: an assembly of items such as works of art, pieces of writing, or natural objects, especially one systematically ordered

examination_example.sentence: He left a large <highlight>collection</highlight> of art to his wife.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他给妻子留下了大量的艺术品。

examination_example.sentence: These letters were made into a <highlight>collection</highlight> of short videos called "A Letter to Friends".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些信件被制作成一个短视频合集，名为“给朋友的一封信”。

examination_example.sentence: The Book of Poetry, the earliest <highlight>collection</highlight> of poems, is of great value in Chinese history.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《诗经》是中国最早的诗集，在中国历史上具有重要价值。
